name: Sb Transitional Sub LLC
specialty: Clinic/Center  Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Sb Transitional Sub LLC is a Clinic/Center  Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Brockton, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $84.7M in Medicaid payments across 785K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $84.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
